SELECT * FROM
(
SELECT a.context as postContext, a.context_img as postImg, a.gis_info as gisInfo, a.status as status, a.user_id as userId, a.simple_img as simpleImg, b.user_name as userName, b.nick_name as nickName, a.create_time FROM UserPublish a, USER b WHERE a.user_id = b.id AND a.inactive_time IS NULL OR a.inactive_time > SYSDATE() UNION SELECT a.context as postContext, a.context_img as postImg, a.gis_info as gisInfo, a.status as status, a.user_id as userId, a.simple_img as simpleImg, b.user_name as userName, b.nick_name as nickName, a.create_time FROM UserPublish a, USER b, UserMsgQueue d WHERE a.user_id = b.id AND
a.inactive_time > SYSDATE()
OR a.inactive_time IS NULL AND a.id = d.publish_id
) c ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
